statements: SELECT * FROM livestock_breeding WHERE id = 1;
SELECT animal_id, birth_date FROM livestock_breeding WHERE parent1_id IS NULL;
SELECT id, breeding_date, breeding_notes FROM livestock_breeding WHERE parent1_id = 5 AND parent2_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM livestock_breeding ORDER BY breeding_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT parent1_id, parent2_id FROM livestock_breeding;
SELECT * FROM livestock_breeding WHERE id = 1;
SELECT animal_id, birth_date FROM livestock_breeding WHERE parent1_id = 123 OR parent2_id = 456;
SELECT id, animal_id, parent1_id, parent2_id, birth_date, breeding_notes FROM livestock_breeding WHERE breeding_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, animal_id, breeding_notes FROM livestock_breeding ORDER BY birth_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_breeding WHERE breeding_notes LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY breeding_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockBreedingInformation;
SELECT animal_name, birth_date FROM LivestockBreedingInformation ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT id, animal_name, breeding_history FROM LivestockBreedingInformation WHERE parent1_id IS NULL AND parent2_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM BreedingPrograms WHERE end_date > NOW();
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_breeding_programs FROM BreedingPrograms;
SELECT * FROM LivestockBreedingInformation WHERE birth_date < '2020-01-01'
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM BreedingPrograms WHERE end_date > '2021-12-31'
SELECT animal_name, breeding_history FROM LivestockBreedingInformation WHERE parent1_id = 5 OR parent2_id = 7
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM BreedingPrograms WHERE program_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM LivestockBreedingInformation WHERE animal_name LIKE '%Cow%' ORDER BY birth_date DESC
SELECT * FROM parent_animal;
SELECT animal_name, breed, gender FROM parent_animal WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM breeding_program ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT animal_name, birth_date, breed FROM parent_animal WHERE breed = 'Labrador Retriever' AND birth_date < '2010-01-01';
SELECT animal_name, breeding_date, breeding_type, result FROM breeding_history WHERE breeding_type = 'AI' ORDER BY breeding_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM parent_animal WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY birth_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT animal_name, breed, birth_date FROM parent_animal WHERE breed='Labrador Retriever' AND birth_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';

SELECT parent_animal.animal_name, breeding_history.breeding_date, breeding_type, result FROM parent_animal JOIN breeding_history ON parent_animal.animal_id = breeding_history.animal_id WHERE breeding_type='Natural' ORDER BY breeding_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT parent_animal.animal_name, birth_date, result FROM parent_animal LEFT JOIN breeding_history ON parent_animal.animal_id = breeding_history.animal_id WHERE result='Successful' AND birth_date < '2015-01-01';

SELECT parent_animal.animal_name AS parent_name, breeding_program.program_name, start_date, end_date FROM parent_animal JOIN breeding_program ON parent_animal.animal_id = breeding_program.program_id ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM parent_animal;
SELECT id, name, breed FROM offspring WHERE age > 2;
SELECT parent_animal.name, breeding_history.breeding_success FROM parent_animal INNER JOIN breeding_history ON parent_animal.id = breeding_history.parent_id;
SELECT * FROM breeding_program WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_offspring FROM offspring;
SELECT * FROM parent_animal;
SELECT id, name, breed FROM breeding_program WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT breed FROM offspring;

SELECT parent_animal.name, offspring.name, breeding_history.mating_date FROM parent_animal JOIN breeding_history ON parent_animal.id = breeding_history.parent_id JOIN offspring ON breeding_history.offspring_id = offspring.id;
SELECT id, name, age FROM parent_animal WHERE age > 5 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM offspring_animal;
SELECT offspring_name, breed, gender FROM offspring_animal WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT parent_name, breed_history FROM parent_animal WHERE breed = 'Labrador Retriever';
SELECT * FROM breeding_stock ORDER BY breeding_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, participation_date FROM breeding_program JOIN program_participation ON breeding_program.program_id = program_participation.program_id WHERE participation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM parent_animal;
SELECT parent_name, birth_date, breed FROM parent_animal WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT parent_name, breed_history FROM parent_animal WHERE breed='Labrador' ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM offspring_animal WHERE breed='Husky' AND gender='Male' ORDER BY birth_date ASC;
SELECT program_name, participation_date, comments FROM breeding_program JOIN program_participation ON breeding_program.program_id = program_participation.program_id ORDER BY participation_date DESC;
